title: (x) AmberMac.com logo and headlines - FF Daxline {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone identify the typeface used on ambermac.com? I’d contact her myself, but I know she’s extremely busy. That _a_ is unusual.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ambermac_6313.png)

 [‹ (x) hand written "enoteca e ristorante" - Cézanne {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194259/http:/typophile.com/node/33339 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ambassador Snooker logo - ITC Bradley Hand {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194259/http:/typophile.com/node/33327 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BradB

comments.content: Thanks! I like it, but it’s a bit expensive for our shop. :-/

You can also purchase individual weights seperately, if you don’t need an entire typefamily. Like [FF Dax Regular and Regular Exp.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194259/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_dax_rg_rg_exp/) Not too expensive. :)

This is actually [FF Daxline](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194259/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_daxline_bold/&sample_text=AmberMac&sample_size=60), Hans Reichel’s improvement over the original design. Better proportions, lower stroke contrast.
